text: Our Registered and Corporate Office is located at 2nd Floor, Tidel Park, 4, Rajiv Gandhi Salai, Taramani, Chennai - 600113, India, which is leased to us by STL.
Our 14 operational data center facilities are located on land that we lease through various entities, the details of which are set out in the following table.
